products.title: Splash Scarlet Red 89mm Vertical Blind
products.description: A family favourite, their luscious splash range comes in a wide variety of colours and blinds. Splash scarlet red is a firey vertical blindslat - perfect for adding a bold, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out vertical blind is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. As a simple plain fabric, this red fabric is especially great for adding a splash of colour in kitchens, as this fabric is also moisture-resistant.

products.title: Splash Scarlett
products.description: Splash scarlett made to measure vertical blind.

products.title: Splash Scarlett Vertical Blind
products.description: This slightly textured, dim-out fabric will bring a splash of colour to an interior. Available in many colours and blackout options available in the bella range. Splash scarlett vertical blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.

products.title: Splash Scarlet
products.description: Min width: 250mm max width: 4115mm min drop: 200mm max drop: 2913mm fabric composition: polyester louvre width: 89mm guarantee: 12 months fittings: included controls: cord control to open and close the blind, beaded chain to tilt louvres. Controls can be positioned on the left or right. Stack: a choice of left, right or split. Louvres: louvres are supplied with top hangers and are available with bottom weights with stabilising chain or chainless bottom weights.
